name: What Lay Beneath
description:
Move with UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT arrow keys
Select with ENTER key
option menu with ESCAPE key

Follow your destiny and solve the puzzles of mind, the heart and the destiny.

What Lay Beneath it's a game made for Lost Cartridge GameJam 3.

@QueerJunk: Story and writing.
@E-7bJohn: Music and sound effects.
@Less: Visual Art.
@Cosmitar: development and game design.
